pr_title: RHPAM-2721 :Clone project via http can not be re-enabled

timeline.message: RHPAM-2721 :Clone project via http can not be re-enabled

timeline.author: jomarko
jomarko

timeline.bodyText: Could we please replace uri.equals(protocolName) with Objects.equals(uri, protocolName)? The later one doesn't throw an exception in case uri or protocolName is null.
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.bodyText:
In past, sonarcloud reported anonymous static initialization as possible risk. @hasys implemented different kind of builders due to this.
Could we please replace all HashMap constructions in this way?
new Maps.Builder<String, String>()
   .put("ssh", "localhost:8080/git")
   .build()
timeline.author: jomarko

timeline.message: RHPAM-2721 :Clone project via http can not be re-enabled

timeline.bodyText:
Just a suggestion.
You could replace the collect() by a forEach with the content of the for loop below.
This way you don't need to create a List<JGitFileSystem>.
timeline.author: caponetto
caponetto

timeline.bodyText: You could use assertTrue() here instead of assertThat().isEqualTo(true).
timeline.author: caponetto

timeline.bodyText: You could use assertTrue() here instead of assertThat().isEqualTo(true).
timeline.author: caponetto

timeline.bodyText: You could use isOne() here instead of isEqualTo(1).
timeline.author: caponetto

timeline.bodyText: You could use assertFalse() here instead of assertThat().isEqualTo(false).
timeline.author: caponetto

timeline.bodyText: You could use isOne() here instead of isEqualTo(1).
timeline.author: caponetto
